table.name: testTable1
table.definition: CREATE TABLE testTable1 ( testColumn1 INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, testColumn2 VARCHAR (16) NOT NULL, testColumn3 SMALLINT UNSIGNED DEFAULT 12, PRIMARY KEY (testColumn1), UNIQUE KEY (testColumn1, testColumn2), KEY (testColumn3) ) DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: testTable2
table.definition: CREATE TABLE testTable2 ( testColumn4 INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, testColumn5 VARCHAR (16) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'dummy', testColumn6 INT , testColumn7 INT, PRIMARY KEY (testColumn4) ) DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
